verbose_text: To understand whether increased STAT3 activation in circulating monocytes could promote retinal angiogenesis, we conducted the laser induced CNV in the LysM-Cre +/- : SOCS3 fl/fl mice, in which SOCS3 was deleted in myeloid cells resulting in spontaneous STAT3 activation [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
evidence: STAT3 activation in circulating monocytes could promote retinal angiogenesis
